mapper.select: select * from hotel where hotelname like concat('%', #{hotelname), '%')
select * from hotel where hashid like concat('%', #{hashtag}, '%')

select *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{latitude}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) -radians(#{longitude}))+sin(radians(#{latitude}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) AS distance from hotel having distance <= #{distance} order by distance
mapper.update: update hotel set userid = #{userid}, hashid = #{hashid}, hotelname = #{hotelname}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, info = #{info}, detail = #{detail} where hotelnumber = #{hotelnumber}
